temple.description: A grand stone temple interior with tall arches, columns, and an altar at the center.

desert_morning.description: A vast desert landscape with rolling sand dunes under a cloudy sky.

forest_6_day.description: A dense forest with tall pine trees under a clear daytime sky.

forest_outskirts_evening.description: A grassy clearing at the edge of a dense forest with mountains in the distance under an evening sky.

castle_interior_night.description: A dimly lit stone castle interior at night with arched doorways and wall sconces casting warm light.

outside_castle_rainy_night.description: A rainy night outside a large castle with dark clouds and wet ground visible through an open gate.

forest_outskirts_night.description: A starry night sky over a grassy clearing surrounded by dense forest with distant mountains in the background.

castle_interior_5_day.description: A long, arched castle corridor illuminated by daylight through tall windows.

chiefs_tent_2.description: A dimly lit tent interior with wooden furniture and a tapestry on the wall.

inside_house_4_day.description: A cozy interior of a rustic house with wooden furniture and an open door letting in daylight.

inside_tent_3_day.description: A dimly lit tent interior with wooden crates, a barrel, and a small window letting in daylight.

army_camp_4_winter_day.description: A winter army camp with tents and watchtowers under a clear blue sky.

mountainside_winter_day.description: A snowy mountainside path flanked by pine trees and rocky cliffs under a cloudy sky.

army_camp_3_winter_day.description: A snowy army camp with tents set up under a cloudy winter sky.

tribal_settlement_winter_day.description: A snowy tribal settlement with tents set against a backdrop of snow-covered mountains under a cloudy sky during the day.
